item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 12, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:

2. A MiniGolf game for Palm OS (225 points | 58 comments)
3. The Minneapolis Street Grid: Explained (56 points | 17 comments)

11. Making progress on side projects with content-driven development (43 points | 6 comments)

13. NASA Pulls Off Delicate Thruster Swap, Keeping Voyager 1 Mission Alive (32 points | 1 comment)

23. Pathpilot (YC S24) is hiring a founding AI and full-stack engineer ( | hide)
24. Passive damping – Bathroom scales (38 points | 18 comments)
25. Searching 32M academic papers for obscene acronyms hidden in the titles (2022) (12 points | 4 comments)
26. SQLite on Rails: The how and why of optimal performance (213 points | 69 comments)
27. Show HN: Simple Alternative to Complex Project Management for Freelancers (31 points | 14 comments)
28. Show HN: HypergraphZ – A Hypergraph Implementation in Zig (54 points | 12 comments)
29. New Rust RFC Proposes Adding Support for Trusted Publishing to Crates.io (12 points | 1 comment)
